name: Clambert's Quest
description:
Play as Captain Clambert in an oceanic struggle for survival!

Instructions:

LEFT and RIGHT arrows / A and D --> MOVE

UP arrow / W to --> JUMP

DOWN arrow / S to --> DASH DOWN

CLICK --> THROW your pearl

CLICK AGAIN --> CHARGE towards your pearl

Attack enemies with the pearl and by charging!

Info:

All music, sound effects, and art by me

Font in the instructions is from scratch.mit.edu

The color palette is called pear36; I got it from lospec.com

Made in 2 weeks for the Pixel Game Maker's Awards
